attributes.action: stop the polyclinics. Put the resources, support and energy into supporting family dr surgeries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Patients want a family doctor service. A surgery that is familiar and comfortable and doctors who know them and their illnesses. Polyclinics are a bad idea. They are commercial businesses and will be run on a monetary basis not a patients first basis.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
